import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Rating, TextArea } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { API_ROOT } from '../constants'; class FormPlant extends Component { state = { nickname: "", commonName: "", scientificName: "", temp: "", tempTol: "", humid: "", humidTol: "", lightExpo: "", lightTol: "", difficultyRating: "", toxic: true, notes: "", searchTerm: "" } componentDidMount() { } handleChange = ev => { this.setState({ [ev.target.name]: ev.target.value }) } handleRating = (ev, {rating}) => { this.setState({ difficultyRating: rating }) } toggleCheckbox = ev => { this.setState(prevState => ( { toxic: !prevState.toxic } )); } handleSubmit = ev => { ev.preventDefault() fetch(`${API_ROOT}/plants`, { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) } render() { return (
